A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: For me\, it was not a perfect movie. I was expecting a lot more Star Wars mythology to come out of this movie. All my theories were shut down and to me\, that was a bit of a let down. Reys parents and Snokes identity were the topics i was most interested in walking into the movie theater\, walking-out i felt shut down in a way. Either way\, i had fun watching this movie. I know the run time was close to 150 minutes but i felt like that went by sooo fast.
